attributes.action: Ignore WHO Covid-19 advice and let's get Great Britain back to being GREAT!
attributes.additional_details: I would like to see the government/parliament debate the whole Covid-19 issue with the view to asking the public what they want i.e. carry on as now or withdraw all the current restrictions and get on with our lives.
attributes.background: Allow the public to decide what the government should do, not the WHO; such contradictory advice cannot be trusted or relied upon. Let's stop the government taking away our freedoms and turning the general population into neurotics! Let's get the UK off its knees and back to work and play.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Referendum on current restrictions and any further lockdowns: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/551539

Lift local lockdowns and Covid-19 restrictions in England: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/551469
